item.title: Boston University's CS lab in 2001 and 2010
item.author: steven@sunpech.com (Steven Suwatanapongched)
item.description: In September 2010, I had the opportunity to visit Boston as part of my All-You-Can-Jet pass from JetBlue. As part of my trip out there, I visited Boston University, where I attended as an undergraduate from 1997 to 2001. While visiting the campus, I took some pictures of the undergraduate CS lab, where I worked long long ago. Different, but yet the same! Back in 2001: Windows machines running Windows 2000 Prof.

item.title: Programmer Cartoon: Your Company App
item.author: steven@sunpech.com (Steven Suwatanapongched)

item.title: The Vending Machine at Work
item.author: steven@sunpech.com (Steven Suwatanapongched)
item.description:
This is my vending machine at work. I happen to like Reeses Peanut Butter Cups. I don’t have a sweet tooth, but it’s the only snack in the entire machine I would buy. Can you see what’s wrong?
It’s behind a 100 Grand, one of the worst pieces of candy in the entire machine. I haven’t enjoyed a 100 Grand since I was a kid, which is probably the age of the candy since everybody knows it’s stale and gross.
